name: Holiday Heist
description:
Twas the night before chrismtas

A busy night at the shop
One naughty elf
Was given the chop

“You cant fire me Santa! I’m your best worker here!”
“I know”… he thought…. “I’ll make it all clear”

“What can I do to get back at this man?
Take all his presents as FAST as I can”

Your mission is steal Santa gifts and give them back to your fellow working elf's, take as many presents as you can and escape the Jolly Red Man.

Created by Team Gigi's moving castle
